name: Dupe
description:
The 2020 summer intern group decided to do a game jam for fun. The theme was "Duplication". This is a simple colorful puzzle game made in 48 hours (more levels coming later(?)).

Controls:

  • Move = WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Record Movement = Hold Shift
  • Send out clone = Space

Credits:

  • Anita He
  • Steven Lam
  • Zied Jebali
